text: Prinos () is a village on the island of Thasos in northern Greece. The village is located in the northwest of the island, 17.4 km southwest from the island's capital and main port of Limenas, and 21.8 km north of Limenaria (in the south of Thasos). The village of Skala Prinou (Σκάλα Πρίνου) is home to the second largest ferry port on the island, with regular routes to Kavala and Nea Peramos in mainland Greece. ==References== ==External links== * Official municipality website Category:Populated places in Thasos
title: Prinos, Thasos
